events.message: I received my order last week but the product is not what I expected, so I want to request a refund immediately.
The issue has been categorized under Refund based on customer's request mentioning a refund.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request submitted by the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. Iâ€™m here to help process your refund request as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide the order number and the reason why you want a refund so we can verify and proceed?
My order number is 789456123. The product does not match the description on your website, so I want a full refund.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately and send you a confirmation email shortly.
I appreciate the quick response and the immediate action to get my refund processed. Thank you for your help.
Your refund has been processed successfully and should reflect in your account within 5 business days.
Just following up to ensure your refund was received and that you are satisfied with the support provided.
The case has been closed as the refund was successfully processed and the customer confirmed satisfaction.
